item.title: Slow Query Logs
item.description: slow_query_log = 1 long_query_time = 1 slow_query_log_file = /var/log/mariadb/slow-query.log log_queries_not_using_indexes See details in https://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/how-to-set-and-enable-mariadb-slow-query-log-linux-unix/
